publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7379 Michael Russell: Curriculum for Excellenceâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the teaching profession and all who work in or are part of school communities for their unprecedented efforts in successfully continuing the roll-out of the Curriculum for Excellence across all primary, special and secondary schools from August 2010; recognises the need for a long-term commitment to the Curriculum for Excellence, and confirms that commitment from this parliament. Supported by: Keith Brown*
